content: In this lesson, you'll learn the basics of HTML, including tags, elements, attributes, and document structure. We'll cover semantic HTML and best practices for creating accessible web pages.

title: CSS Basics
description: Learn how to style your web pages with CSS
content: Discover the power of CSS styling. Learn about selectors, properties, the box model, flexbox, and responsive design fundamentals.

title: JavaScript Introduction
content: Learn JavaScript fundamentals including variables, data types, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation. Start building interactive web applications.

title: React Hooks Deep Dive
description: Master useState, useEffect, and custom hooks
content: Deep dive into React Hooks. Learn how to use useState for state management, useEffect for side effects, and create your own custom hooks.

title: State Management with Context
description: Learn to manage global state with React Context API
content: Master the React Context API for managing global application state. Learn when to use Context vs prop drilling and best practices for context providers.

title: Performance Optimization
description: Optimize your React applications for better performance
content: Learn React performance optimization techniques including memoization, lazy loading, code splitting, and profiling with React DevTools.

title: Python Basics
content: Learn Python fundamentals including syntax, data types, control structures, functions, and object-oriented programming basics.

title: NumPy and Pandas
description: Data manipulation with NumPy and Pandas libraries
content: Master NumPy for numerical computing and Pandas for data manipulation. Learn to work with arrays, DataFrames, and perform data analysis.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to machine learning concepts and algorithms
content: Learn machine learning fundamentals including supervised and unsupervised learning, classification, regression, and model evaluation.

title: SEO Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of Search Engine Optimization
content: Master SEO fundamentals including keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and link building strategies.

title: Social Media Marketing
content: Learn to create effective social media marketing campaigns across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

title: Content Marketing Strategy
description: Build a successful content marketing strategy
content: Learn to create, distribute, and promote valuable content that attracts and retains your target audience.

faqs.question: How do I enroll in a course?
faqs.answer: Simply browse our course catalog, select the course you're interested in, and click the 'Enroll' button. You'll need to create an account or sign in first.

faqs.question: Can I access courses on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our platform is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices including smartphones and tablets.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all courses. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

faqs.question: Are there any prerequisites for courses?
faqs.answer: Prerequisites vary by course. Check the course details page for specific requirements and recommended prior knowledge.

faqs.question: How long do I have access to a course?
faqs.answer: Once you enroll in a course, you have lifetime access to all course materials and future updates.
